PHRASE.LANG: It’s never too cold during the snowy season as long as you have these warm and cozy Reindeer Slippers by the Junk Guy.\n [#Legal]
Il n'est jamais trop froid pendant la saison des neiges aussi longtemps que vous avez ces chaussons de rennes chaleureuses et confortables par le Junk Guy.\n [#Legal]
Es ist nie zu kalt in der verschneiten Jahreszeit, solange Sie diese warme und gemütliche Hausschuhe Rentier vom Junk-Guy haben.\n [#Legal]
Non è mai troppo freddo durante la stagione nevosa fino a quando si dispone di queste pantofole Renna calde e accoglienti dal Junk Guy.\n [#Legal]
Nunca es demasiado frío durante la temporada de nieve, siempre y cuando usted tiene estas zapatillas reno cálido y acogedor por el Junk Guy.\n [#Legal]
It’s never too cold during the snowy season as long as you have these warm and cozy Reindeer Slippers by the Junk Guy.\n [#Legal]
It’s never too cold during the snowy season as long as you have these warm and cozy Reindeer Slippers by the Junk Guy.\n [#Legal]
